title: Stanza Living acquires Singularity Automation to strengthen its tech ecosystem - Economic Times
content: Stanza Living acquires Singularity Automation to strengthen its tech ecosystem  Economic Times
description: Gurugram-based Stanza Living, which provides managed accommodations to students and working professionals, did not disclose the deal value. Stanza Living recently raised USD 57 million (Rs 425 crore) in debt financing from Kotak Mahindra Bank, RBL Bank and Alteria Capital.
